cause.description:
Regardless of one's personal beliefs, others are entitled to their personal views and discrimintaion for taking advantage of this liberty is wrong and should be stopped. Rather than discrimination and hostility, I suggest: promote your beliefs if you wish, but if others do not agree simply accept that choice.
1. Acceptance Over Violence
cause.mission: Promote the widespread acceptance of religions and beliefs in hopes of providing a more peaceful, less hostile world.
cause.name: ACCEPTANCE NOT VIOLENCE
